attributes.action: Deploy military to return and control migrants, deploy navy to turn back boats
attributes.additional_details: Such action should have a positive outcome in reducing illegal immigration and likely to be favoured by a majority of the electorate.
attributes.background: Use military and navy to eliminate illegal immigration into the UK.

rejection.details: You may wish to sign this petition, which calls for the same action: "Send the navy into the channel to help stop illegal migrants entering the UK" https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/730769
